ERROR

POST

token,
otp

GET

ERROR
STATUS RESPONSE

this is where you sent otp with token received during signup and after this user is verified

Method Header

ERROR
STATUS RESPONSE
200 no response will be given meaning loged out

sent Authorization header with value as Token plus space plus token in header and responses will come as follow
